header.name: Flesh & Blood
header.author: G of Diamonds (converted by System Converter)
header.description: Biochemical facility overrun by monsters; fuse/card/power-gated progression with multiple escape routes.

rooms.name: Prison (Start)
rooms.description: Players begin in separate cells; wall device with card reader & sampler.

rooms.name: Security Room
rooms.description: Monitor wall. Two bodies (researcher + guard). Guard has employee card.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: Ransacked desk; bullets; contracts; Bathory family book; experiment notes 'X'.

rooms.name: Control Room
rooms.description: Core controls. With any two colors powered can open Countess; with RGB powered can open Main Door.

rooms.name: Countess’s Prison
rooms.description: Hyper-cold chamber housing Countess E. Bathory, hooked to blood-storage.

rooms.name: Power Distribution Room
rooms.description: High-voltage room. Fuse slots (Red/Blue/Green), fire extinguisher, first aid.

rooms.name: Small Room
rooms.description: Observation space; gas masks.

rooms.name: Experimental Area
rooms.description: Bed with hypnotic gas; large container (sleeping monster); console with 4 buttons.

rooms.name: Operational Area
rooms.description: Work zone; partial glass wall; straps.

rooms.name: Large Laboratory
rooms.description: Central lab connected to operational area & hall.

rooms.name: Secret Laboratory
rooms.description: Hidden behind panel; Bio-Fusion sample & animal-creation console.

rooms.name: Pharmaceutical Laboratory
rooms.description: Universal Cell Serum; captured animal for 'Tissue Flower' growth.

rooms.name: Airlock Room
rooms.description: Pressure door & alarm between pharma and cryo.

rooms.name: Cryogenic Storage
rooms.description: −80°C; reagent to inhibit ghoul proliferation; removable backup fuse.

rooms.name: Hall
rooms.description: White marble tiles; staff photos; storage walls. Leads to Incinerator & Lounge.

rooms.name: Morgue
rooms.description: Neat metal drawers; conveyor connecting to incinerator.

rooms.name: Incinerator
rooms.description: Control panel; waste flap to sewer—alternative escape.

rooms.name: Lounge
rooms.description: Snack counter; hidden handgun in sofa; bar with spirits.

rooms.name: Counseling Room
rooms.description: Classroom-like; tapes & experiment logs.

rooms.name: Main Door of the Research Facility (Exit)
rooms.description: Exterior exit; needs RGB power + employee card.

doors.notes: Opens with employee card from Security Room guard.
Needs cryo backup fuse (Green) or override from Power Room.
Red+Blue+Green fuses ON and employee card.
Any two colors powered lets Control open Countess’s prison.
Slides open via panel; hinted by Office notes.
Conveyor hatch controlled from Morgue panel.

game_elements.name: Employee Card
game_elements.notes: On guard body in Security Room; opens card-lock doors.

game_elements.name: Lab Key
game_elements.notes: On dead researcher; opens lab cabinets.

game_elements.name: Fuses (Red/Blue/Green)
game_elements.notes: Insert into Power box to energize circuits.

game_elements.name: Experimental Console (4 btns)
game_elements.notes: 1 Awake monster (if no gas). 2 Disable bed injector. 3 Release/bypass gas. 4 Hidden drawer with spare fuse.

game_elements.name: Sleeping Monster (container)
game_elements.notes: In Operational/Experimental area; wakes without gas.

game_elements.name: Young Girl (partial ghoul)
game_elements.notes: On hospital bed; can hint correct button.

game_elements.name: Hidden Panel to Secret Lab
game_elements.notes: From Large Lab to Secret Lab.

game_elements.name: Universal Cell Serum
game_elements.notes: In Pharma Lab; used for 'Universal Cell' or suppression.

game_elements.name: Cryo Backup Fuse
game_elements.notes: Removing cuts cryo machines; also gates airlock door.

game_elements.name: Sewer Escape via Incinerator
game_elements.notes: Set waste flap downward to drop into sewers.

game_elements.name: Main Door Power Indicator
game_elements.notes: Shows RGB status; open with card when all lit.

game_elements.name: Bathory Book & Contracts
game_elements.notes: In Office; family history & custom serum shipments.
